name: God of Chakra：Final Battle
description:
The brand new Ninja Mobile RPG is storming the place! Play as a ninja leader and recruit your forces to create your own faction. Expand your influence and safeguard your village. Destroy your foes with unmatched Justus!

Over a Hundred Powerful Ninjas
Recruit legendary ninjas and create unique combinations for different battles! Write your victories in history with the living legends of ninjas!


Diverse Game Modes
Experience the thrilling action in Ninja Quests, World Bosses, and Cross-Server Arena! Take your time and relax with the AFK Farming, Fishing, and Scroll Contests! It's your game, your choice!

Match Up Your Appearance
Various appearance options of characters and mounts that allow you to match up! Adds a gorgeous touch of fashion to the Ninja World!
